title: Adani Power will continue to supply power to Bangladesh
description: Adani Power will keep supplying electricity to Bangladesh from its 1,600MW Jharkhand plant, even as new guidelines allow such plants to sell power within India. The amendment aims to streamline power export processes. Adani Power reiterated its commitment to fulfilling Bangladesh's electricity requirements despite recent political challenges.
